top.title: Minneapolis protesters march against ICE as governor urges Trump to remove agents
top.summary: Second fatal shooting an 'inflection point' says Tim Walz as protests spread over Saturday's shooting of intensive care nurse Alex Pretti in Minneapolis.

top.title: 'This is horrifying' - Minneapolis residents reel from second deadly shooting
top.summary: Two people have been shot dead by federal agents in the city in recent weeks, leaving many angry and frustrated.

top.title: Who was Alex Pretti, the intensive care nurse shot dead in Minneapolis?
top.summary: He has been described as an avid outdoorsman who loved mountain biking.

top.title: What does a new US TikTok deal mean for users?
top.summary: While TikTok's future in the US has been secured, questions remain about exactly what changes US users will see.

top.title: Is China quietly winning the AI race?
top.summary: The BBC's Lily Jamali looks into why big US firms and start-ups alike are turning to Chinese tech.

top.title: Ubisoft cancels six games including Prince of Persia and closes studios
top.summary: The studio, known for Assassin's Creed and Just Dance, is also delaying seven titles in a restructure.

title.#text: Creators and communities everywhere take a stand against ICE
